skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of increasing the duration of all debuffs on the target by 1 turn.
skills.name: Bludgeon

skills.desc: Places a [Block Debuffs] buff on all allies for 1 turn, then places a [Shield] buff on all allies for equal to 30% of this Champion's MAX HP for 2 turns. Heals all allies by 25% of their MAX HP.
skills.name: Protection of Gods

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 70% chance to put each target's Skills on cooldown. Has a 30% chance to fully deplete each target's Turn Meter.
skills.name: Orcish Rituals
